welcome_message_body: Welcome to Manado! Get ready to experience the enchanting beauty of this city known for its stunning coral reefs, vibrant food scene, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore all that Manado has to offer and enjoy every moment of your stay.

restaurants.name: RM Nasi Kuning Selamat Pagi
restaurants.description: RM Nasi Kuning Selamat Pagi is a breakfast spot located in Manado.
restaurants.address: Jl. Jend. Sudirman (Kampung Kodo), Manado, Sulawesi Utara
